title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to talk with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LangChain LLM & Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, syntax highlighting & prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune, deploy, build RAG, function-calling & multi-modal apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open-WebUI & GPU support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, StarCoder, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Bridge to run GPT4All models inside Ollama runtime via custom Modelfiles.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings private/local LLM power to your workspace via Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing & summarization using Ollama models locally.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Fine-tune Mistral-7B on your data and serve with Ollama; includes LoRA & QLoRA scripts.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama with tokio & serde support.
